channel.title: [TUT] Photoshop- How To Add Brushes 2 your Brush Pack![TUT]
channel.description:
[b][size=32pt][Tut] How to add Brushes/Mega Brush Packs to your brush collection![/size][/b]
[b][size=24pt]Commonly Asked Questions[/size][/b]
Now some of you guys might be wondering what? What do u mean â€œAddâ€ brushes to our Photoshop Brush Collection? Well the answer is quite simple. Because the more brushes selections you have in your Photoshop the more options you have to make your design more professional and good-looking.
[b][size=24pt]Procedures[/size][/b]
[b][size=11pt]Step 1.)[/size][/b] To do this itâ€™s quite simple first we have to go and download all those Brushes, hereâ€™s the link. [b]Notice 1:[/b] you must have a Torrent Downloading program and know how to use it! (more info. please scroll down to the very end.)
[url=http://www.torrentbox.com/torrents-search.php?search=photoshop+brush&cat=0&onlyname=yes&submit=TBox+Search]http://www.torrentbox.com/torrents-search.php?search=photoshop+brush&cat=0&onlyname=yes&submit=TBox+Search[/url]
[img]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/4302/picrm7.png[/img] [i][size=8pt]Here's a snapshot of what it should look like and which is what. Choose your Brush Packs!![/size][/i]
[b][size=11pt]Step 2.)[/size][/b] Look at the descriptions and other stuff that intestes you. After when your done examining it. Click on the download link (Shown here Below)
[img]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/9392/pic2hq7.png[/img] [i][size=8pt]Look Through the torrent ( read the comments very importan, 'cause u never know if the torrent have virus or not. and if it's working or now.) and Click on the download link.[/size][/i]
[b][size=11pt]Step 3.)[/size][/b] This Part is really easy Basictly just open Torrent -> Press OK, [b]Notice 2:[/b] Mine Torrent website might be indifferrent with yours so dont panic. ( just press 'Ok' when a window pops up :P)
here's the picture for my Torrent Downloading Program (BitComet- below).
[img]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/7246/pic3rj1.png[/img] [i][size=8pt]Look through the pop up window and select what to download then press 'OK' button.[/size][/i]
[b][size=11pt]Step 4.)[/size][/b] Once Pressed the 'Ok' button wait for it to finish download. It will finish downloading once the percent turns to 100%.
[img]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/8383/pic4wl5.png[/img] [i][size=8pt]wait for it to turn into 100%.[/size][/i]
[b][size=11pt]Step 5.)[/size][/b] Open your downloaded files and extrat them all to the Adobe Photoshop brush folder. [b]Notice 3:[/b] inorder to find the brush folder. First we have to open up Adobe Photoshop folder which should be located in ''C:\..Program Files\Adobe'' onece here look for the photoshop folder ( the one that your currently using, for me it would be ''Adobe Photoshop CS2'' Picture below)then Open your Photoshop folder and there you should find a folder name ''Presets'' click it and find another folder called ''Brushes'' click that and WOla! All the photoshops' brushes belong here. just extract all those brushes you have downloaded to this folder and there you have it!
[img]http://img162.imageshack.us/img162/2579/pic5kh0.png[/img] [size=8pt][i]Find your Photoshop Folder inside Adobe folder which should be located inside your Program folder.[/i][/size]
[img]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/4281/pic6rn3.png[/img] [i][size=8pt]inside your photoshop folder your'll see a folder called ''Presets'' click it and find the brush folder[/size][/i]
[img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/8766/pic7qx9.png[/img] [i][size=8pt]Once inside the Presets folder Click on Brush Folder and extract All your Brushes inside here, make sure that after extracting you do not have any .rar files inside your Brush folder.[/size][/i]
[b][size=11pt]Step 6.)[/size][/b] For more information on how to use those Brushes go to this link :P [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,12474.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,12474.0.html[/url]
[size=24pt][b]Notices:[/b][/size]
[b]Notice 1:[/b] Yes indeed you must have a Torrent downloading program. First of all, what is a Torrent downloading program? obiously it's a program that download Torrents! Torrents are like host link from a user/person uploading his/her file through a server-> program to your computer. ofcourse they're more than just one person uploading / downloading. there's more than you think! anyways now you know what a Torrent is ( you should also know that torrents are like lifesavers! they give you the power to acces to programs that people who spend more than $100 to get their hands on. like Photoshop CS2 and other good programs and games etc. :P i love torrents :P [b]But ofcourse, not all torrents are safe so you should scan them before using it. here's a link you could use to scan file online, it totally free [url=http://virusscan.jotti.org/]http://virusscan.jotti.org/[/url] enjoy :)[/b] to download Torrent and to know how to use them go to this link [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1266.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1266.0.html[/url] i'm sure there's alot of cool stuff there :cool: enjoy :D
[b][size=13pt]Credits:[/size][/b] Please give credit to Eagertolearn who spend like about 3-4 hours getting picture and finishing this TUT thanks for your appreciation :D

item.title: [TUT] Photoshop- How To Add Brushes 2 your Brush Pack![TUT]

item.description:
@eagertolearn wrote:

[size=32pt][Tut] How to add Brushes/Mega Brush Packs to your brush collection![/size]

[size=24pt]Commonly Asked Questions[/size]

Now some of you guys might be wondering what? What do u mean â€œAddâ€ brushes to our Photoshop Brush Collection? Well the answer is quite simple. Because the more brushes selections you have in your Photoshop the more options you have to make your design more professional and good-looking.

[size=24pt]Procedures[/size]

[size=11pt]Step 1.)[/size] To do this itâ€™s quite simple first we have to go and download all those Brushes, hereâ€™s the link. Notice 1: you must have a Torrent Downloading program and know how to use it! (more info. please scroll down to the very end.)

http://www.torrentbox.com/torrents-search.php?search=photoshop+brush&cat=0&onlyname=yes&submit=TBox+Search


[size=8pt]Here’s a snapshot of what it should look like and which is what. Choose your Brush Packs!![/size]

[size=11pt]Step 2.)[/size] Look at the descriptions and other stuff that intestes you. After when your done examining it. Click on the download link (Shown here Below)


[size=8pt]Look Through the torrent ( read the comments very importan, 'cause u never know if the torrent have virus or not. and if it’s working or now.) and Click on the download link.[/size]

[size=11pt]Step 3.)[/size] This Part is really easy Basictly just open Torrent -> Press OK,
Notice 2: Mine Torrent website might be indifferrent with yours so dont panic. ( just press ‘Ok’ when a window pops up :P)

here’s the picture for my Torrent Downloading Program (BitComet- below).


[size=8pt]Look through the pop up window and select what to download then press ‘OK’ button.[/size]

[size=11pt]Step 4.)[/size] Once Pressed the ‘Ok’ button wait for it to finish download. It will finish downloading once the percent turns to 100%.


[size=8pt]wait for it to turn into 100%.[/size]

[size=11pt]Step 5.)[/size] Open your downloaded files and extrat them all to the Adobe Photoshop brush folder. Notice 3: inorder to find the brush folder. First we have to open up Adobe Photoshop folder which should be located in ‘‘C:…Program Files\Adobe’’ onece here look for the photoshop folder ( the one that your currently using, for me it would be ‘‘Adobe Photoshop CS2’’ Picture below)then Open your Photoshop folder and there you should find a folder name ‘‘Presets’’ click it and find another folder called ‘‘Brushes’’ click that and WOla! All the photoshops’ brushes belong here. just extract all those brushes you have downloaded to this folder and there you have it!


[size=8pt]Find your Photoshop Folder inside Adobe folder which should be located inside your Program folder.[/size]


[size=8pt]inside your photoshop folder your’ll see a folder called ‘‘Presets’’ click it and find the brush folder[/size]


[size=8pt]Once inside the Presets folder Click on Brush Folder and extract All your Brushes inside here, make sure that after extracting you do not have any .rar files inside your Brush folder.[/size]

[size=11pt]Step 6.)[/size] For more information on how to use those Brushes go to this link
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,12474.0.html

[size=24pt]Notices:[/size]

Notice 1: Yes indeed you must have a Torrent downloading program. First of all, what is a Torrent downloading program? obiously it’s a program that download Torrents! Torrents are like host link from a user/person uploading his/her file through a server-> program to your computer. ofcourse they’re more than just one person uploading / downloading. there’s more than you think! anyways now you know what a Torrent is ( you should also know that torrents are like lifesavers! they give you the power to acces to programs that people who spend more than $100 to get their hands on. like Photoshop CS2 and other good programs and games etc. i love torrents But ofcourse, not all torrents are safe so you should scan them before using it. here’s a link you could use to scan file online, it totally free http://virusscan.jotti.org/ enjoy to download Torrent and to know how to use them go to this link http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1266.0.html i’m sure there’s alot of cool stuff there enjoy
